dct:title.value: Additions of three hyphomycetous fungi to the hyphomycetes of Pakistan
Adição de três fungos hyphomycetous aos hyphomycetes do Paquistão

foaf:Organization.foaf:name: Department of Plant Pathology, PMAS Arid Agriculture University Rawalpindi, Pakistan
Pulses Research Institute, AARI, Faisalabad, Pakistan
Department of Plant Pathology, PMAS Arid Agriculture University Rawalpindi, Pakistan
Pulses Research Institute, AARI, Faisalabad, Pakistan

bibo:abstract.value: Hyphomycetous fungi Asteromyces cruciatus, a laboratory contaminant, Gyrothrix dichotoma from the fallen bottle brush branch and Wiesneriomyces javanicus from the deteriorating and decaying leaf of Holstonia scholaris a new host, were identified/ recorded for the first time from Rawalpindi, Pakistan.

Os fungos Hyphomycetous Asteromyces cruciatus, um contaminante laboratório, Gyrothrix dichotoma que acomete ramos em solo e Wiesneriomyces Javanicus fungo de deterioração e incidente em folhas caídas de Holstonia scholaris um novo hospedeiro, foram identificados/registrados pela primeira vez em Rawalpindi, Paquistão.
